scripts.for-gh-pages: (if exist docs rmdir docs /s /q) && move build docs
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run for-gh-pages && npm run commit-docs
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push --tags origin master
scripts.commit-docs: git add --all "docs/*" && git commit -m "built for release"
scripts.test-build: npm run build && npm run serve-production
